answers.answer: Hi,I think that if your 1-hour test is abnormal, you will be watched more closely and definitely be asked to monitor your glucoses as well as possibly start treatment so that your glucoses do not continue to run high during the rest of your pregnancy. This, as you know, is very important.  It also is important in regard to risk for future diabetes and your health. I agree that the test somewhat seems artificial due to the high glucose load, but we do know that the results have important implications, even a test for just a 1-hour post. Not ideal, but we can still use it.Good luck and congratulations on your pregnancy. Take care.
